title: Android Boot Camp for Developers using Java, Comprehensive: A Be
description:
Gain a strong foundation in Java programming with the confidence and technical skills to build actual, successful mobile applications with ANDROID BOOT CAMP FOR DEVELOPERS USING JAVAÃ¢â€žÂ¢, COMPREHENSIVE: A BEGINNER'S GUIDE TO CREATING YOUR FIRST ANDROID APPS. Written by award-winning technology author Corinne Hoisington, this book prepares readers with a thorough introduction to both JavaÃ¢â€žÂ¢ and the secrets to creating effective mobile applications. It's the ideal choice for readers who already have a little programming experience or are new to Java. Learners gain a solid understanding of programming logic and Java tools for Android today and into the future.
